item.title: Pickup
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

It only parses 4 digit item ids. Place a zero “0”, infront of the id if it’s a 3 digit id.

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup
item.dc:creator: @lord_dharok lord dharok
item.description:
@lord_dharok wrote:

having problems with pickup it will only let me pickup gold and thats it i went into client.jave and there’s this thing thats says something about only letting me pick up gold should i remove it let me post a picture below

else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“kyle”) || playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10”);

this what it says please help me so i can get pickup working
